synopsis.text: Although Takumi Kayano's life was abruptly ended by the wind god Syl, he is given a second chance in a new world filled with perilous monsters. As an act of contrition, Syl bestows upon Takumi an array of skills to help him navigate this unfamiliar realm. In the heart of a treacherous forest, Takumi encounters two young children, who he names Alan and Elena, and takes under his wing. To his astonishment, the children possess formidable combat abilities, enabling them to vanquish monsters with ease. As they reach a nearby town, Takumi registers with the adventurer's guild, embarking on a thrilling journey filled with adventure and growth alongside his newfound family. Join Takumi, Alan, and Elena as they traverse the mystical world of Etelldia in this captivating isekai fantasy!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
